Name: Juicy Gypsy
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fresh and juicy, with herbal complexity.
History: A riff on the classic Gypsy Queen by yours truly.
Nutrition: One serving of Juicy Gypsy contains 171 calories
